thread.section_title: Regalarflores.net opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Regalarflores.net | www.regalarflores.net | 3 de 69
thread.title: Marian Manescu

author: Marian Manescu
title: Marian Manescu
text: I have ordered flowers for my girlfriend to be delivered at her adress in Sevilla. Unfortunately, she was called to take herself the flowers from the delivering company. I am not satisfied at all also by the reaction of the company, as their only response on the customer service on ¨whatsapp¨ whas ¨the flowers were delivered¨. Taking everything into consideration, I will fill complaint to the european authorities for consumer protection, because this behaviour cannot stay like this; incomplete services, unsatisfactory dialogue with the client, no apologies or explanation.
